item.title: Example
item.description: Some useful examples, and explanations about Ansible. --- - name: "k8s ops" # Create a hosts file , and use -i <host_file> hosts: k8s become: yes become_user: yi.wu remote_user: yi.wu tasks: - name: "Playbook" # Run shell command shell: "sudo docker pull alpine:3.16" # Command args args: # Use bash executable: "/bin/bash" # Capture output register: output - debug: var=output.stdout_lines

item.title: Localhost
item.description: A minimal localhost example in case I forgot Ansible. --- - name: "Playing with Ansible" hosts: localhost connection: local tasks: - name: "ls -l" shell: "hostname" register: "output" - debug: var=output.stdout_lines
